Earnings Call Insights: Simulations Plus (SLP) Q2 2025

Management View

  • CEO Shawn O’Connor highlighted a 23% year-over-year revenue increase, with 5% organic growth, driven by the Adaptive Learning & Insights (ALI) and Medical Communication (MC) business units. Adjusted EBITDA was $6.6 million, representing 29% of revenue.
